Class NflowJettyConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.nflow.jetty.config.NflowJettyConfiguration
@Configuration @ComponentScan("io.nflow.jetty") @Import({RestConfiguration.class,JmxConfiguration.class,MetricsConfiguration.class}) @EnableTransactionManagement public class NflowJettyConfiguration extends Object
